definition: using force to cause something to occur
details:
noun
- using force to cause something to occur
= example: using force to cause something to occur
= synonyms: coercion
- an urge to do or say something that might be better left undone or unsaid
= example: an urge to do or say something that might be better left undone or unsaid
- an irrational motive for performing trivial or repetitive actions, even against your will
= example: an irrational motive for performing trivial or repetitive actions, even against your will
= synonyms: obsession
